markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Stave Off Catastrophe](/Feats.aspx?ID=2265) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 53</row>

**Archetype** [Swordmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=33)

**Prerequisites**
[Shoulder Catastrophe](/Feats.aspx?ID=1141)

</column>

---

You fully protect your allies from the worst blows. When you use the [Shoulder Catastrophe](/Feats.aspx?ID=1141) reaction, you can choose to take the full critical damage and effects from the attack, including effects that apply on a critical hit, and have your ally take no damage and avoid the attack's effects.
name: Stave Off Catastrophe
